message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.HC. 

The paper focuses on automated deception detection in real-life courtroom trial videos using different modalities like vision, audio, and text. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also uses machine learning techniques, which suggests it could belong to cs.MM (Multimedia). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of transcripts, which could place it in cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also mentions the use of classifiers, indicating it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper includes a user-study, which suggests it could belong to cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction).
